${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Recall.NAME: Recall
${modID}:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Odd: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

${modID}:Spark.NAME: Spark
${modID}:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DarkBolt.NAME: Dark Bolt
${modID}:DarkBolt.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, a random enemy loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DarkBolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, a random enemy loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FuelReserve.NAME: Fuel Reserve
${modID}:FuelReserve.DESCRIPTION: FOK Gain !M! [E]. NL Add a Sparking Things+ to your deck. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:FuelReserve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: FOK+ Gain !M! [E]. NL Add a Sparking Things+2 to your deck. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:SparkingThings.NAME: Sparking Things
${modID}:SparkingThings.DESCRIPTION: FOK Add !M! *Sparks to your hand. NL Add a *Fuel *Reserve to your deck. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:SparkingThings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: FOK+ Add !M! *Sparks to your hand. NL Add a *Fuel *Reserve+ to your deck. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:SwiftJab.NAME: Swift Jab
${modID}:SwiftJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Even: Discard 1 card. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:SwiftJab.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Even: Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

${modID}:ShiftingCurrents.NAME: Shifting Currents
${modID}:ShiftingCurrents.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least 2 ${modID}:Flow, consume it and deal double damage instead.
${modID}:ShiftingCurrents.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least 2 ${modID}:Flow, consume it and deal double damage to ALL enemies instead.

${modID}:GustPunch.NAME: Gust Punch
${modID}:GustPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 ${modID}:Flow.

${modID}:GetSomeShade.NAME: Get Some Shade
${modID}:GetSomeShade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.
${modID}:GetSomeShade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

${modID}:CracklingArc.NAME: Crackling Arc
${modID}:CracklingArc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, repeat on a nearby one.
${modID}:CracklingArc.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, repeat on a nearby one.

${modID}:ElectrifyingBarrier.NAME: Electrifying Barrier
${modID}:ElectrifyingBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 *Spark. NL Next turn, gain 1 *Spark for every !M! damage blocked.
${modID}:ElectrifyingBarrier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 *Spark. NL Next turn, gain 1 *Spark for every !M! damage blocked.

${modID}:ConserveSpark.NAME: Conserve Spark
${modID}:ConserveSpark.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Unspent energy is conserved this turn.
${modID}:ConserveSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Unspent energy is conserved this turn.

${modID}:HotLeafJuice.NAME: Hot Leaf Juice
${modID}:HotLeafJuice.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Add 1 Burn to your draw pile.
${modID}:HotLeafJuice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Add 1 Burn to your draw pile.

${modID}:MidfightFire.NAME: Midfight Campfire
${modID}:MidfightFire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Spark to your hand.
${modID}:MidfightFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Spark to your hand.

${modID}:ElementalStrike.NAME: Elemental Strike
${modID}:ElementalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has a debuff, apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:ReboundKick.NAME: Rebound Kick
${modID}:ReboundKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your hand. NL It costs 1.
${modID}:ReboundKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your hand. NL It costs 1.

${modID}:EvenExchange.NAME: Even Exchange
${modID}:EvenExchange.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL  ${modID}:Even: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust 1 card.
${modID}:EvenExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL  ${modID}:Even: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust 1 card.

${modID}:PushThrough.NAME: Push Through
${modID}:PushThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Block, play an echo of this card.
${modID}:PushThrough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Block, play an echo of this card.

${modID}:UmbralChains.NAME: Umbral Chains
${modID}:UmbralChains.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
${modID}:UmbralChains.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
${modID}:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a Burn to the top of your draw pile.
${modID}:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a Burn to the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:PressurePoint.NAME: Pressure Point
${modID}:PressurePoint.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Pressure. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their ${modID}:Pressure.
${modID}:PressurePoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Pressure. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their ${modID}:Pressure.

${modID}:FivePointStrike.NAME: Five Point Strike
${modID}:FivePointStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! ${modID}:Pressure. Enemy loses HP equal to its ${modID}:Pressure.

${modID}:PressureRelief.NAME: Pressure Relief
${modID}:PressureRelief.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Pressure. All enemies lose HP equal to twice their ${modID}:Pressure. NL Remove all ${modID}:Pressure from the target.
${modID}:PressureRelief.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Pressure. All enemies lose HP equal to twice their ${modID}:Pressure. NL Remove all ${modID}:Pressure from the target.

${modID}:EssenceBarrier.NAME: Essence Barrier
${modID}:EssenceBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have an Elemental Aspect, gain !${modID}:elementalBlock! additional Block.

${modID}:Hunger.NAME: Hunger
${modID}:Hunger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Odd: Draw 2 cards. NL ${modID}:Even: Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.
${modID}:Hunger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Odd: Draw 2 cards. NL ${modID}:Even: Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

${modID}:OddOdds.NAME: Odd Odds
${modID}:OddOdds.DESCRIPTION: Guess the type of the top card of the draw pile. NL If your guess is correct: NL ${modID}:Odd: Draw 3 cards. NL ${modID}:Even: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OddOdds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Guess the type of the top card of the draw pile. NL If your guess is correct: NL ${modID}:Odd: Draw 3 cards. NL ${modID}:Even: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AttackGuessChoice.NAME: Attack
${modID}:AttackGuessChoice.DESCRIPTION: The top card of your draw pile is an Attack.

${modID}:SkillGuessChoice.NAME: Skill
${modID}:SkillGuessChoice.DESCRIPTION: The top card of your draw pile is a Skill.

${modID}:NeitherGuessChoice.NAME: Neither
${modID}:NeitherGuessChoice.DESCRIPTION: The top card of your draw pile is neither an Attack nor a Skill.

${modID}:InnerFocus.NAME: Inner Focus
${modID}:InnerFocus.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no Block, draw !M! card at the start of the next turn.
${modID}:InnerFocus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no Block, draw !M! cards at the start of the next turn.

${modID}:BurdenCycle.NAME: Burden Cycle
${modID}:BurdenCycle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Odd: Gain [E] for each debuff on the leftmost enemy. NL ${modID}:Even: Remove one of your debuffs.
${modID}:BurdenCycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Odd: Gain [E] for each debuff on the leftmost enemy. NL ${modID}:Even: Remove one of your debuffs.

${modID}:Erupt.NAME: Erupt
${modID}:Erupt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.
${modID}:Erupt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:BlazingGuard.NAME: Blazing Guard
${modID}:BlazingGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Even: Draw and upgrade 1 card.

${modID}:Cauterize.NAME: Cauterize
${modID}:Cauterize.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Burn to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Cauterize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Burn to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Ignite.NAME: Ignite
${modID}:Ignite.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 2 ${modID}:Burnt.
${modID}:Ignite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 2 ${modID}:Burnt.

${modID}:ParalyzingTouch.NAME: Paralyzing Touch
${modID}:ParalyzingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce an enemy's Strength by !M!. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ParalyzingTouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce an enemy's Strength by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DexterousKick.NAME: Dexterous Kick
${modID}:DexterousKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DexterousKick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:UnbalancingWinds.NAME: Unbalancing Winds
${modID}:UnbalancingWinds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL If both hits land on the same enemy, apply !M! Vulnerable.
${modID}:UnbalancingWinds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL If both hits land on the same enemy, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:GoWithTheFlow.NAME: Go with the Flow
${modID}:GoWithTheFlow.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Odd: Draw 1 card. Gain !M! ${modID}:Flow. NL ${modID}:Even: Discard 2 cards. Gain !M! [E].
${modID}:GoWithTheFlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Odd: Draw 1 card. Gain !M! ${modID}:Flow. NL ${modID}:Even: Discard 2 cards. Gain !M! [E].

${modID}:WindOfChange.NAME: Wind of Change
${modID}:WindOfChange.DESCRIPTION: Transform up to !M! cards in your hand. Maintain upgrades. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:WindOfChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Transform up to !M! cards in your hand. Maintain upgrades. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Thunderclap.NAME: Thunderclap
${modID}:Thunderclap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, deal 2 damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Thunderclap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, deal 2 damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:UmbralEchoes.NAME: Umbral Echoes
${modID}:UmbralEchoes.DESCRIPTION: Replay the top card in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UmbralEchoes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replay one of the top two cards in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShotInTheDark.NAME: Shot in the Dark
${modID}:ShotInTheDark.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Dark *Bolt into your draw pile.
${modID}:ShotInTheDark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Dark *Bolt into your draw pile.

${modID}:Blur.NAME: Blur
${modID}:Blur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
${modID}:Blur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:Flight.NAME: Flight
${modID}:Flight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Flight. If all stacks are consumed, become Entangled. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Flight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Flight. If all stacks are consumed, become Entangled. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:KindleSpirit.NAME: Kindle Spirit
${modID}:KindleSpirit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Spark to your hand.
${modID}:KindleSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Spark to your hand.

${modID}:PhoenixTenacity.NAME: Phoenix Tenacity
${modID}:PhoenixTenacity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw or Exhaust a status card, apply !M! ${modID}:Burnt to the leftmost enemy. NL Drawn Burns Exhaust immediately.
${modID}:PhoenixTenacity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw or Exhaust a status card, apply !M! ${modID}:Burnt to the leftmost enemy. NL Drawn Burns Exhaust immediately.

${modID}:GustAspect.NAME: Gust Aspect
${modID}:GustAspect.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Flow.
${modID}:GustAspect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Flow.

${modID}:ThunderAspect.NAME: Thunder Aspect
${modID}:ThunderAspect.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FlameAspect.NAME: Flame Aspect
${modID}:FlameAspect.DESCRIPTION: When playing an attack, increase its damage this combat and add !M! to the next attack's bonus this turn.
${modID}:FlameAspect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When playing an attack, increase its damage this combat and add !M! to the next attack's bonus this turn.

${modID}:ShadowAspect.NAME: Shadow Aspect
${modID}:ShadowAspect.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, EVERYONE gains !B! *Cursed *Block. NL At the end of your turn, steal half of EVERYONE's Block.
${modID}:ShadowAspect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, EVERYONE gains !B! *Cursed *Block. NL At the end of your turn, steal ALL of EVERYONE's Block.

${modID}:PastPresentFuture.NAME: Past Present Future
${modID}:PastPresentFuture.DESCRIPTION: Scry 3. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Repeat with a card from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PastPresentFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry 5. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Repeat with a card from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PerfectPosition.NAME: Perfect Position
${modID}:PerfectPosition.DESCRIPTION: This turn, ${modID}:Odd, ${modID}:Even, ${modID}:Third effects always trigger. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ClawFrenzy.NAME: Claw Frenzy
${modID}:ClawFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL ${modID}:Even: Deal 1 additional hit.
${modID}:ClawFrenzy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL ${modID}:Even: Deal 1 additional hit.

${modID}:PositionalStrike.NAME: Positional Strike
${modID}:PositionalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Odd: Increase damage by !M!. NL ${modID}:Third: Deal double damage.
${modID}:PositionalStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Odd: Increase damage by !M!. NL ${modID}:Third: Deal double damage.

${modID}:DragonsBreath.NAME: Dragon's Breath
${modID}:DragonsBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burnt. NL Costs 1 less for every !${modID}:burntthreshold! ${modID}:Burnt on all enemies. NL Add a Burn to your hand.
${modID}:DragonsBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burnt. NL Costs 1 less for every !${modID}:burntthreshold! ${modID}:Burnt on all enemies. Add a Burn to your draw and discard piles.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Burnt. NL Costs 1 less for every !${modID}:burntthreshold! Burnt on all enemies. NL Add a Burn to your hand.

${modID}:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
${modID}:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 5 times. NL Deals an additional !D! damage per ${modID}:Flow stack. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Tornado.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 5 times. NL Deals an additional !D! damage per ${modID}:Flow stack. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlowState.NAME: Flow State
${modID}:FlowState.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain or lose ${modID}:Flow, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.
${modID}:FlowState.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain or lose ${modID}:Flow, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Flow.

${modID}:ElementalSurge.NAME: Elemental Surge
${modID}:ElementalSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity for each different elemental aspect you have. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ElementalSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity for each different elemental aspect you have. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HaulAfflictions.NAME: Haul Afflictions
${modID}:HaulAfflictions.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 ${modID}:Choke to ALL enemies. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each debuff they have.
${modID}:HaulAfflictions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 4 ${modID}:Choke and 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each debuff they have.

${modID}:ShadowRitual.NAME: Shadow Ritual
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Odd: The [#FFFDE5]ritual continues.
Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If this is the 3rd card played this turn, draw 2 cards, gain 3 [E], and Exhaust this card.
Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL If this is the 3rd card played this turn, draw 3 cards, gain 4 [E], and Exhaust this card.

${modID}:DarklingPact.NAME: Darkling Pact
${modID}:DarklingPact.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a Darkling Minion. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DarklingPact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Summon a Darkling Minion. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TimelyBoost.NAME: Timely Boost
${modID}:TimelyBoost.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a card in your hand permanently. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:TimelyBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards in your hand permanently. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:AuroraRay.NAME: Aurora Ray
${modID}:AuroraRay.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, reduce cost by unspent [E].
${modID}:AuroraRay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, reduce cost by unspent [E].

${modID}:MagneticSiphon.NAME: Magnetic Siphon
${modID}:MagneticSiphon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL ${modID}:Odd: Spend 25 Gold, target enemy loses 25 HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:MagneticSiphon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL ${modID}:Odd: Spend 25 Gold, target enemy loses 25 HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StormBringer.NAME: Storm Bringer
${modID}:StormBringer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and [E].
${modID}:StormBringer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and [E] [E].

${modID}:LightningConduit.NAME: Lightning Conduit
${modID}:LightningConduit.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL Reduce the cost of X random cards in hand by 1 this turn. NL Exhaust
${modID}:LightningConduit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL Reduce the cost of X random cards in hand by 1 this turn. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Languor.NAME: Languor
${modID}:Languor.DESCRIPTION: Reduce your Strength by 1. NL Fleeting.
